problem_names:
lemma in_rtrancl_on_in_F:
  assumes "(a,b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r" shows "a \<in> F" "b \<in> F"

lemma rtrancl_on_induct[consumes 1, case_names base step, induct set: rtrancl_on]:
  assumes "(a, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r"
    and "a \<in> F \<Longrightarrow> P a"
        "\<And>y z. \<lbrakk>(a, y) \<in> rtrancl_on F r; (y,z) \<in> r; y \<in> F; z \<in> F; P y\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> P z"
  shows "P b"

lemma rtrancl_on_trans:
  assumes "(a,b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r" "(b,c) \<in> rtrancl_on F r" shows "(a,c) \<in> rtrancl_on F r"

lemma converse_rtrancl_on_into_rtrancl_on:
  assumes "(a,b) \<in> r" "(b, c) \<in> rtrancl_on F r" "a \<in> F"
  shows "(a, c) \<in> rtrancl_on F r"

lemma rtrancl_on_converseI:
  assumes "(y, x) \<in> rtrancl_on F r" shows "(x, y) \<in> rtrancl_on F (r\<inverse>)"

theorem rtrancl_on_converseD:
  assumes "(y, x) \<in> rtrancl_on F (r\<inverse>)" shows "(x, y) \<in> rtrancl_on F r"

lemma converse_rtrancl_on_induct[consumes 1, case_names base step, induct set: rtrancl_on]:
  assumes major: "(a, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r"
    and cases: "b \<in> F \<Longrightarrow> P b"
       "\<And>x y. \<lbrakk>(x,y) \<in> r; (y,b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r; x \<in> F; y \<in> F; P y\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> P x"
  shows "P a"

lemma converse_rtrancl_on_cases:
  assumes "(a, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r"
  obtains (base) "a = b" "b \<in> F"
    | (step) c where "(a,c) \<in> r" "(c,b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r"

lemma rtrancl_on_sym:
  assumes "sym r" shows "sym (rtrancl_on F r)"

lemma rtrancl_on_mono:
  assumes "s \<subseteq> r" "F \<subseteq> G" "(a,b) \<in> rtrancl_on F s" shows "(a,b) \<in> rtrancl_on G r"

lemma rtrancl_consistent_rtrancl_on:
  assumes "(a,b) \<in> r\<^sup>*"
  and "a \<in> F" "b \<in> F"
  and consistent: "\<And>a b. \<lbrakk> a \<in> F; (a,b) \<in> r \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> b \<in> F"
  shows "(a,b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r"

lemma rtrancl_on_rtranclI:
  "(a,b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r \<Longrightarrow> (a,b) \<in> r\<^sup>*"
translations:
lemma in_rtrancl_on_in_F:
  assumes "(a,b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r" shows "a \<in> F" "b \<in> F"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a \<in> F &&& b \<in> F
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  (a, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a \<in> F &&& b \<in> F
by induct auto

lemma rtrancl_on_induct[consumes 1, case_names base step, induct set: rtrancl_on]:
  assumes "(a, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r"
    and "a \<in> F \<Longrightarrow> P a"
        "\<And>y z. \<lbrakk>(a, y) \<in> rtrancl_on F r; (y,z) \<in> r; y \<in> F; z \<in> F; P y\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> P z"
  shows "P b"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P b
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  (a, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r
  a \<in> F \<Longrightarrow> P a
  \<lbrakk>(a, ?y) \<in> rtrancl_on F r; (?y, ?z) \<in> r; ?y \<in> F;
   ?z \<in> F; P ?y\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> P ?z

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P b
by (induct a b) (auto dest: in_rtrancl_on_in_F)

lemma rtrancl_on_trans:
  assumes "(a,b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r" "(b,c) \<in> rtrancl_on F r" shows "(a,c) \<in> rtrancl_on F r"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (a, c) \<in> rtrancl_on F r
using assms(2,1)

proof (prove)
using this:
  (b, c) \<in> rtrancl_on F r
  (a, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (a, c) \<in> rtrancl_on F r
by induct (auto intro: rtrancl_on_into_rtrancl_on)

lemma converse_rtrancl_on_into_rtrancl_on:
  assumes "(a,b) \<in> r" "(b, c) \<in> rtrancl_on F r" "a \<in> F"
  shows "(a, c) \<in> rtrancl_on F r"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (a, c) \<in> rtrancl_on F r
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (a, c) \<in> rtrancl_on F r
have "b \<in> F"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. b \<in> F
using \<open>(b,c) \<in> _\<close>

proof (prove)
using this:
  (b, c) \<in> rtrancl_on F r

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. b \<in> F
by (rule in_rtrancl_on_in_F)

proof (state)
this:
  b \<in> F

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (a, c) \<in> rtrancl_on F r
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (a, c) \<in> rtrancl_on F r
apply (rule rtrancl_on_trans)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. (a, ?b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r
 2. (?b, c) \<in> rtrancl_on F r
apply (rule rtrancl_on_into_rtrancl_on)

proof (prove)
goal (4 subgoals):
 1. (a, ?b3) \<in> rtrancl_on F r
 2. (?b3, ?b) \<in> r
 3. ?b \<in> F
 4. (?b, c) \<in> rtrancl_on F r
apply (rule rtrancl_on_refl)

proof (prove)
goal (4 subgoals):
 1. a \<in> F
 2. (a, ?b) \<in> r
 3. ?b \<in> F
 4. (?b, c) \<in> rtrancl_on F r
by fact+

proof (state)
this:
  (a, c) \<in> rtrancl_on F r

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma rtrancl_on_converseI:
  assumes "(y, x) \<in> rtrancl_on F r" shows "(x, y) \<in> rtrancl_on F (r\<inverse>)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (x, y) \<in> rtrancl_on F (r\<inverse>)
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  (y, x) \<in> rtrancl_on F r

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (x, y) \<in> rtrancl_on F (r\<inverse>)
proof induct

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. y \<in> F \<Longrightarrow> (y, y) \<in> rtrancl_on F (r\<inverse>)
 2. \<And>ya z.
       \<lbrakk>(y, ya) \<in> rtrancl_on F r; (ya, z) \<in> r; ya \<in> F;
        z \<in> F; (ya, y) \<in> rtrancl_on F (r\<inverse>)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (z, y) \<in> rtrancl_on F (r\<inverse>)
case (step a b)

proof (state)
this:
  (y, a) \<in> rtrancl_on F r
  (a, b) \<in> r
  a \<in> F
  b \<in> F
  (a, y) \<in> rtrancl_on F (r\<inverse>)

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. y \<in> F \<Longrightarrow> (y, y) \<in> rtrancl_on F (r\<inverse>)
 2. \<And>ya z.
       \<lbrakk>(y, ya) \<in> rtrancl_on F r; (ya, z) \<in> r; ya \<in> F;
        z \<in> F; (ya, y) \<in> rtrancl_on F (r\<inverse>)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (z, y) \<in> rtrancl_on F (r\<inverse>)
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (y, a) \<in> rtrancl_on F r
  (a, b) \<in> r
  a \<in> F
  b \<in> F
  (a, y) \<in> rtrancl_on F (r\<inverse>)
have "(b,b) \<in> rtrancl_on F (r\<inverse>)" "(b,a) \<in> r\<inverse>"

proof (prove)
using this:
  (y, a) \<in> rtrancl_on F r
  (a, b) \<in> r
  a \<in> F
  b \<in> F
  (a, y) \<in> rtrancl_on F (r\<inverse>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (b, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F (r\<inverse>) &&& (b, a) \<in> r\<inverse>
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  (b, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F (r\<inverse>)
  (b, a) \<in> r\<inverse>

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. y \<in> F \<Longrightarrow> (y, y) \<in> rtrancl_on F (r\<inverse>)
 2. \<And>ya z.
       \<lbrakk>(y, ya) \<in> rtrancl_on F r; (ya, z) \<in> r; ya \<in> F;
        z \<in> F; (ya, y) \<in> rtrancl_on F (r\<inverse>)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (z, y) \<in> rtrancl_on F (r\<inverse>)
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (b, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F (r\<inverse>)
  (b, a) \<in> r\<inverse>
show ?case

proof (prove)
using this:
  (b, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F (r\<inverse>)
  (b, a) \<in> r\<inverse>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (b, y) \<in> rtrancl_on F (r\<inverse>)
using step

proof (prove)
using this:
  (b, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F (r\<inverse>)
  (b, a) \<in> r\<inverse>
  (y, a) \<in> rtrancl_on F r
  (a, b) \<in> r
  a \<in> F
  b \<in> F
  (a, y) \<in> rtrancl_on F (r\<inverse>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (b, y) \<in> rtrancl_on F (r\<inverse>)
by (metis rtrancl_on_trans rtrancl_on_into_rtrancl_on)

proof (state)
this:
  (b, y) \<in> rtrancl_on F (r\<inverse>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. y \<in> F \<Longrightarrow> (y, y) \<in> rtrancl_on F (r\<inverse>)
qed auto

theorem rtrancl_on_converseD:
  assumes "(y, x) \<in> rtrancl_on F (r\<inverse>)" shows "(x, y) \<in> rtrancl_on F r"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (x, y) \<in> rtrancl_on F r
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  (y, x) \<in> rtrancl_on F (r\<inverse>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (x, y) \<in> rtrancl_on F r
by - (drule rtrancl_on_converseI, simp)

lemma converse_rtrancl_on_induct[consumes 1, case_names base step, induct set: rtrancl_on]:
  assumes major: "(a, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r"
    and cases: "b \<in> F \<Longrightarrow> P b"
       "\<And>x y. \<lbrakk>(x,y) \<in> r; (y,b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r; x \<in> F; y \<in> F; P y\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> P x"
  shows "P a"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P a
using rtrancl_on_converseI[OF major] cases

proof (prove)
using this:
  (b, a) \<in> rtrancl_on F (r\<inverse>)
  b \<in> F \<Longrightarrow> P b
  \<lbrakk>(?x, ?y) \<in> r; (?y, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r; ?x \<in> F;
   ?y \<in> F; P ?y\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> P ?x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P a
by induct (auto intro: rtrancl_on_converseD)

lemma converse_rtrancl_on_cases:
  assumes "(a, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r"
  obtains (base) "a = b" "b \<in> F"
    | (step) c where "(a,c) \<in> r" "(c,b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk>a = b; b \<in> F\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> thesis;
     \<And>c.
        \<lbrakk>(a, c) \<in> r; (c, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> thesis
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  (a, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk>a = b; b \<in> F\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> thesis;
     \<And>c.
        \<lbrakk>(a, c) \<in> r; (c, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> thesis
by induct auto

lemma rtrancl_on_sym:
  assumes "sym r" shows "sym (rtrancl_on F r)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sym (rtrancl_on F r)
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  sym r

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sym (rtrancl_on F r)
by (auto simp: sym_conv_converse_eq intro: symI dest: rtrancl_on_converseI)

lemma rtrancl_on_mono:
  assumes "s \<subseteq> r" "F \<subseteq> G" "(a,b) \<in> rtrancl_on F s" shows "(a,b) \<in> rtrancl_on G r"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (a, b) \<in> rtrancl_on G r
using assms(3,1,2)

proof (prove)
using this:
  (a, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F s
  s \<subseteq> r
  F \<subseteq> G

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (a, b) \<in> rtrancl_on G r
proof induct

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<lbrakk>b \<in> F; s \<subseteq> r; F \<subseteq> G\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> (b, b) \<in> rtrancl_on G r
 2. \<And>x y.
       \<lbrakk>(x, y) \<in> s; (y, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F s; x \<in> F;
        y \<in> F;
        \<lbrakk>s \<subseteq> r; F \<subseteq> G\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> (y, b) \<in> rtrancl_on G r;
        s \<subseteq> r; F \<subseteq> G\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (x, b) \<in> rtrancl_on G r
case (step x y)

proof (state)
this:
  (x, y) \<in> s
  (y, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F s
  x \<in> F
  y \<in> F
  \<lbrakk>s \<subseteq> r; F \<subseteq> G\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> (y, b) \<in> rtrancl_on G r
  s \<subseteq> r
  F \<subseteq> G

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<lbrakk>b \<in> F; s \<subseteq> r; F \<subseteq> G\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> (b, b) \<in> rtrancl_on G r
 2. \<And>x y.
       \<lbrakk>(x, y) \<in> s; (y, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F s; x \<in> F;
        y \<in> F;
        \<lbrakk>s \<subseteq> r; F \<subseteq> G\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> (y, b) \<in> rtrancl_on G r;
        s \<subseteq> r; F \<subseteq> G\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (x, b) \<in> rtrancl_on G r
show ?case

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (x, b) \<in> rtrancl_on G r
using step assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  (x, y) \<in> s
  (y, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F s
  x \<in> F
  y \<in> F
  \<lbrakk>s \<subseteq> r; F \<subseteq> G\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> (y, b) \<in> rtrancl_on G r
  s \<subseteq> r
  F \<subseteq> G
  s \<subseteq> r
  F \<subseteq> G
  (a, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F s

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (x, b) \<in> rtrancl_on G r
by (intro converse_rtrancl_on_into_rtrancl_on[OF _ step(5)]) auto

proof (state)
this:
  (x, b) \<in> rtrancl_on G r

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>b \<in> F; s \<subseteq> r; F \<subseteq> G\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> (b, b) \<in> rtrancl_on G r
qed auto

lemma rtrancl_consistent_rtrancl_on:
  assumes "(a,b) \<in> r\<^sup>*"
  and "a \<in> F" "b \<in> F"
  and consistent: "\<And>a b. \<lbrakk> a \<in> F; (a,b) \<in> r \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> b \<in> F"
  shows "(a,b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (a, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r
using assms(1-3)

proof (prove)
using this:
  (a, b) \<in> r\<^sup>*
  a \<in> F
  b \<in> F

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (a, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r
proof (induction rule: converse_rtrancl_induct)

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<lbrakk>b \<in> F; b \<in> F\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> (b, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r
 2. \<And>y z.
       \<lbrakk>(y, z) \<in> r; (z, b) \<in> r\<^sup>*;
        \<lbrakk>z \<in> F; b \<in> F\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> (z, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r;
        y \<in> F; b \<in> F\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (y, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r
case (step y z)

proof (state)
this:
  (y, z) \<in> r
  (z, b) \<in> r\<^sup>*
  \<lbrakk>z \<in> F; b \<in> F\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> (z, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r
  y \<in> F
  b \<in> F

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<lbrakk>b \<in> F; b \<in> F\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> (b, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r
 2. \<And>y z.
       \<lbrakk>(y, z) \<in> r; (z, b) \<in> r\<^sup>*;
        \<lbrakk>z \<in> F; b \<in> F\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> (z, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r;
        y \<in> F; b \<in> F\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (y, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (y, z) \<in> r
  (z, b) \<in> r\<^sup>*
  \<lbrakk>z \<in> F; b \<in> F\<rbrakk>

have "z \<in> F"

  (z, b) \<in> r\<^sup>*
  \<lbrakk>z \<in> F; b \<in> F\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> (z, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r
  y \<in> F
  b \<in> F

goal (1 subgoal):

by (rule_tac consistent) simp

proof (state)
this:
  z \<in> F

goal (2 subgoals):

with step

lemma rtrancl_on_rtranclI:
  "(a,b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r \<Longrightarrow> (a,b) \<in> r\<^sup>*"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (a, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r \<Longrightarrow> (a, b) \<in> r\<^sup>*
by (induct rule: rtrancl_on_induct) simp_all

lemma rtrancl_on_sub_rtrancl:
  "rtrancl_on F r \<subseteq> r^*"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rtrancl_on F r \<subseteq> r\<^sup>*
using rtrancl_on_rtranclI

proof (prove)
using this:
  (?a, ?b) \<in> rtrancl_on ?F ?r \<Longrightarrow>
  (?a, ?b) \<in> ?r\<^sup>*

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rtrancl_on F r \<subseteq> r\<^sup>*
by auto
end
